project.description: Selenium HTML tests for Security Group Operations. The test will be executed for ui-test-acct-01/user00

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: console_protocol
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Protocol that eucalyptus console uses: can be http or https

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: browser_type
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Browser type for the test: can be firefox or iexplorer

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: repo_url
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Github repo URL of test suite

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: dir
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Directory of the cloned test suite

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
git clone $repo_url
cd /root/se34euca
git checkout $branch
cd
java -jar /root/selenium-server-standalone-2.39.0.jar -userExtensions "/root/user-extensions.js" -htmlSuite "*$browser_type" "$console_protocol://$console_ip:8888" "/root/se34euca/selenium_ide/KOALA/$test_suite_name" "Koala_SECURITY_GROUP_OPS.html" -trustAllSSLCertificates
